a medical examination of the lower part of the colon (= the lower part of the tube that takes solid waste out of your body): The Cancer Society recommends a flexible sigmoidoscopy every five years. The patient continued to experience severe abdominal pain and was taken for sigmoidoscopy.

A similar procedure, called a flexible sigmoidoscopy, examines a smaller portion of the colorectal area. 44 percent of those surveyed said they had never had a sigmoidoscopy or colonoscopy.
